MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer, affecting properties in Commerce Road industrial estate and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:34am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:53 AM on Monday, 15 March 2021.
